snippet: The Cardinals beat the visiting Rockies Saturday as Adam Wainwright took a no-hitter into the eighth, the second straight dominant performance by Cardinals pitching.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; St Louis Cardinals beat Colorado Rockies, 3-0; other scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Cardinals beat the visiting Rockies Saturday as Adam Wainwright took a no-hitter into the eighth, the second straight dominant performance by Cardinals pitching.

headline.seo: Cardinals Beat Rockies on Wainwright’s Two-Hitter
